title: Chapter 4366 - Chapter 4366: 4,365 — An All-Out War, A War Of The Universe! 4
body:
Chapter 4366 - Chapter 4366: 4,365 — An All-Out War, A War Of The Universe! 4

Chapter 4366: 4,365 — an all-out war, a war of the universe! 4

Translator: 549690339

Every treasure had a limit to how much it could withstand.

Even if it was the ultimate treasure of the Heaven’s origin.

Take the ancestral tree as an example. If Wang Xian’s strength had achieved another breakthrough.

It was possible that Wang Xian could not recover from his peak condition by using the mother’s womb fruit to revive.

Perhaps after Wang Xian tried using it to revive, he could only attain the strength of the Great Dao. The rest would require resources to recover.

This was the problem of energy crossing the line.

There was a limit to the treasures that could be revived, as well as treasures like the resurrection flower.

Boom! Boom! Boom

“Ah!”

However, when the king of Void used his powerful innate skill to move Wang Xian to the side.

The attacks of the demonic fiend and the fallen Shadow Demon Emperor had already landed on the body of the king of Void.

Wang Xian’s strength was already stronger than the king of Void.

The king of Void needed to use 100% of his strength to deal with Wang Xian.

After dealing with Wang Xian, how would he have the chance to deal with Wang Xian?

The terrifying energy landed on his body and immediately caused a large number of wounds to appear on his body.

This attack had caused him to be severely injured!

The king of Void’s pale eyes were filled with shock and anger.

He swept his gaze across Wang Xian and the rest and growled, “Mirror Universe!”

A terrifying power burst out from his pupils as a mirror-like space appeared one after another.

In each mirror, there was a king of Void!

Countless mirrors and countless phantoms pounced towards Wang Xian and the rest!

“Leave it to me!”

When Mo Sha saw the king of Void’s move, a solemn expression appeared on his face.

“Hell descends, demons dance wildly!”

With a loud roar, the entire space turned black and red!

The black and red space enveloped all the mirrors and attacked the king of void in the mirror!

“He wants to escape, to the right!”

At this moment, a message was displayed on the divination lamp.

Wang Xian’s eyes focused. He waved his dragon claws and endless chains attacked the figure of the king of Void!

“King of Void, you shall stay here today. Don’t even think about escaping!”

The Fallen Shadow Demon Emperor’s pair of blood-red eyes stared at everything as he waved his arm.

The demon’s arm crossed the void and grabbed at the king of Void!

“Crash!”

All the mirrors in the surroundings were slowly shattered by the demon’s attack.

The king of Void’s surroundings were entangled by the chains.

A demonic hand grabbed his body!

When the king of Void saw this scene, his face was filled with shock, anger, and embarrassment!

The spatial attribute was good at escaping.

However, there was a limit to this.

He already had a lot of escape methods!

However, he had to face Wang Xian and the other two great dao existences.

He had a lot of tricks and trump cards. Wang Xian and the others also had a lot of them!

One against three, he was still lacking by a lot!

“All of you deserve to die!”

The king of Void was in despair. He roared furiously!

“All of you deserve to die!”

He roared with all his might once again. His body trembled and the spot on his chest cracked open.

An illusory image of the universe appeared directly!

The space disc on his staff entered his chest directly!

“Crackle crackle!”

However, at this instant, the chains around him descended into endless lightning and attacked the spatial disc!

The void King stared at everything with a cold expression.

“Destroy him!”

The Fallen Shadow Devil Emperor roared at Mosha!

Mosha moved and spat out a blood-red ball, flying towards the void King.

This time, the king of Void did not stop him!

He knew that he could not escape!

Facing the three top-tier existences like the Dragon King, he could not escape at all!

Now, he used most of the energy in his body to open a passage.

He could be killed.

But the treasures and resources in his hands could not be lost!

Otherwise, the losses this time would be too great!

Especially the void disk, the most precious treasure of the Heaven’s origin creation realm.

He definitely could not throw it away!

Buzz Buzz

The blood-red ball enveloped him and quickly melted the life force in his body.

The king of Void’s eyes were filled with killing intent as he stared at Wang Xian and the other two!

At his chest, the void disk entered his body and entered the illusory universe!

In the end, his life force completely disappeared.

Wang Xian’s body moved and flew over directly. He kept the corpse and opened the space where the Netherworld Dragon was chasing him!

“Let’s get the treasures and resources that he sent away first!”

Wang Xian shouted immediately!

His eyes were sparkling.

He wanted to send the treasures and resources away even though he was facing the three of them?

Wasn’t he looking down on them too much?

Buzz

The passageway opened and Wang Xian and the rest entered in an instant!

The void disk appeared in his line of sight!

Wang Xian waved his dragon claw and clawed at it directly!

Buzz

However, at this instant, the void disk flickered slightly and flew forward rapidly.

In front of him was a planet within the territory of the Void dynasty

This was not the center of the Void Universe.

It was the king of Void, a place for resurrection!

The King of Void, the first place where a life form was resurrected, was not at the palace of the Void dynasty.

This was to prevent a powerful enemy from coming directly to the palace of the Void dynasty after killing him once.

However, the king of Void did not expect Wang Xian to be able to chase him from such a faraway place!

Wang Xian’s body trembled. It was as if the void disk had sunk into a quagmire.

“Let Go!”

At this moment, the King of Void’s furious roar was heard.

“Hehe!”

Wang Xian smiled.

Before he could speak, the fallen Shadow Demon Emperor and the demonic fiend charged towards the direction where the king of Void was resurrected!

Boom Boom

Boom Boom

Two extremely terrifying attacks instantly destroyed the planet in front of them.

The figure of the king of void quickly dodged into the distance.

As for the void disk, he did not dare to retrieve it.

He could only control it from afar!

Buzz

Wang Xian instantly arrived in front of the void disk. With a wave of his arm, a surge of energy suppressed it firmly.

At the same time, with a slight movement of his palm, the Tai Chi Dragon Disk and the Void Dragon Pool appeared.

Three powerful supreme treasures sealed the void disc.

Suppression!

Wang Xian waved his arm and kept it.

Although this would reduce Wang Xian’s strength by one mastery level.

At the same time, even if the king of Void didn’t have the void disc, it would also reduce one mastery level!

“Kill!”

After Wang Xian kept it, he stared at the king of Void and chased after it.

At the same time, a piece of news was also sent to the Elven Empress Dragon Palace.

The Battle of the universe had begun!

“Huff! Huff!”

The king of Void felt that his heaven origin destiny treasure was being suppressed. His breathing was rapid.

However, at this moment, he didn’t dare to fight head-on with Wang Xian and the rest.

In fact, he didn’t even dare to get close to them.

Relying on the huge distance between them, the king of Void tried his best to flee into the distance.

Toward the palace of the Void dynasty!
